name: King of the Hill (itch) (Heartbreak)
description:
King of the Hill - is 2D arcade action castle defense game. In game goal is to protect castle from waves of enemies, there are upgrades and hero variety in game that make game interesting and involve user to play more.

The game was created for "lovers" of pixel graphics, hardcore gameplay and the ability to assemble your character from scratch. 

The game has integrated 6 unique classes that will help you in the fight against monsters.

Features
  • Fast pace addicting game
  • Adrenaline (fast reflexes required)
  • Our own soundtracks
  • HD graphics
  • Constant updates
  • Android & Ios support
  • Addictive gameplay
  • Intuitive interface
  • 100% FREE
